scripts.build: npm run build-code && [ "$SKIP_DATA" ] || npm run build-data
scripts.build-data: node src/generate-info.js && ls src/data-*.py | xargs -n 1 uv run
scripts.refresh-submodules: git submodule foreach --recursive 'git fetch origin && git checkout origin/main --quiet && git reset --hard origin/main'
scripts.deploy: npm run lint && npm run build && wrangler deploy
scripts.lint: dprint fmt && npx -y oxlint --fix src/*.js src/utils/*.js && npx -y tsc --project tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.test: node src/generate-info.js && node --test test-node/*.test.js && vitest run
